Emine Bozoğlan Ceylan Scholarship Fund

Emine Bozoğlan Ceylan

Dear Emine Bozoğlan Ceylan lost her life during the earthquake disaster on February 6, 2023. She was a loving mother and teacher who devoted her life to her children and their education. Emine Hanım's legacy is being preserved through this education fund, which reflects her values and life.

Donate Now

Emine Bozoğlan Ceylan Scholarship Fund

This education fund has been established by the children in memory of Emine Bozoğlan Ceylan, who passed away during the earthquake disaster on February 6, 2023, with the aim of honoring her memory and providing an opportunity for university students affected by the earthquake to continue their education. Through this fund, you can also support the realization of the educational dreams of the students affected by the earthquake by contributing to this meaningful effort.

TEV donation page

In our memories, Emine Bozoğlan Ceylan

If you would like to obtain more information about the Emine Bozoğlan Ceylan Scholarship Fund, you can reach us at the email address burs@eminebozoglanceylan.com
